channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: Kafka is Fast – I'll use Postgres
item.description:
Modern practices actively encourage this. The other camp chases common sense This camp is far more pragmatic. The basic premise is that you shouldn’t complicate things with new tech when you don’t need to, and that Postgres alone solves most problems pretty well.

Read more

item.title: From VS Code to Helix
item.description:
VS Code “Just Works”, and Helix sounded like more work than the few clicks from VS Code’s extension store. What Helped Just Do It I tried Helix. Helix just worked the way I wanted.

Read more

item.title: I made a 10¢ MCU Talk
item.description:
How does 2-bit ADPCM work. Each 2-bit code tells the decoder how to adjust the current prediction and the step size index. This adaptive step is what makes it ADPCM (Adaptive Differential PCM).

Read more

item.title: The jQuery Age of AI Agents
item.description:
Safari, you wrote jQuery. It became so dominant that developers would learn jQuery before learning vanilla JavaScript. Every combination requires custom code.

Read more

item.title: Recreating a Homebrew Game System from 1987
item.description:
Game selection on the multi-cartridge is performed with DIP switches. ) Z80PIO: Port $00: Controller input (bits 0-5, active low) Port $01: Internal control register A (Must be set to $4F for proper operation. Inufuto has ported 20 games written with it to the Z80 TV Game.

Read more

item.title: Life After Work
item.description:
How can people prosper even as their wages collapse. Today, the majority of people get most of their income by selling their labor. But full automation will break this pattern.

Read more

item.title: Show HN: Learn German with Games
item.description:
Choose Your Learning AdventureSelect a game below and start mastering German in an engaging, interactive way. Numbers to Words GameSee a number and type the German word - perfect for learning German number vocabularyWords to Numbers GamePractice recognizing German number words and converting them to digitsGerman Time GameLearn to tell time in German by reading analog clocks and typing time expressionsTime Short Form GamePractice German time with short forms: nach, vor, halb, viertel, and punktGuess the ArtikelMaster German artikels (der, die, das) by guessing the correct artikel for each nounGuess the WordTranslate German nouns to English - see a German word with its article and type the English meaningEnglish Nouns to GermanSee an English word and type the German translation with its artikelVerb ConjugationPractice conjugating German verbs in present tense for all persons - ich, du, er/sie/es, wir, ihr, sie/SieGerman Verbs to EnglishSee a German verb and type its English meaning - perfect for building vocabularyEnglish Verbs to GermanSee an English verb meaning and type the German infinitive form - reverse translation practice.

Read more

item.description:

item.title: New attacks are diluting secure enclave defenses from Nvidia, AMD, and Intel
item.description:
It’s hard to overstate the reliance that entire industries have on three TEEs in particular: Confidential Compute from Nvidia, SEV-SNP from AMD, and SGX and TDX from Intel. It defeats the latest TEE protections from all three chipmakers. Even Nvidia claims that its TEE security protects against “infrastructure owners such as cloud providers, or anyone with physical access to the servers.

Read more

item.title: Grammarly rebrands to 'Superhuman,' launches a new AI assistant
item.description:
The Business plan will cost $33 per month (billed annually) and will give users access to Superhuman Mail. Register now and save 50% on your pass. Topics AI, AI assistant, grammarly, Startups, superhuman Ivan Mehta Ivan covers global consumer tech developments at TechCrunch.

Read more
